import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete event by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/events/{EventId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a single event by its identifier. For recurring series, delete a specific instance using [DELETE /api/v1.0/events/\{EventId\}/\{instance\}](/docs/api/events/delete-recurring-event).

**Prerequisites**
1. **EventId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/events/query](/docs/api/events/get-events-by-query-post) and extract `Items[].EventId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Locate event: [POST /api/v1.0/events/query](/docs/api/events/get-events-by-query-post) -&gt; extract `Items[].EventId`.
2. Delete event: [DELETE /api/v1.0/events/\{EventId\}](/docs/api/events/delete-event).

**Minimal Required Fields**: EventId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"EventId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Deleted successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Standard response for event and event type delete operations. Returns success status and any validation errors.","properties":{"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned by the API when a request fails.","properties":{"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code associated with the failure","example":401},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the error","example":"Attempted to perform an unauthorized operation."}},"required":["StatusCode","Message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}},"title":"EventsDeleteResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
